word:
Other Wicked Cities 

      As we near the close of this earth's history, we shall have the scenes of the San Francisco calamity repeated 
                                                                           115
in other places. . . . These things make me feel very solemn because I know that the judgment day is right upon us. The judgments that have already come are a warning, but not the finishing, of the punishment that will come on wicked cities. . . .
